mapper.select: /* stat.mng.dashboard.getStatisticData */ SELECT A.statistic_date ,SUM(A.visit_cnt) visit_cnt ,SUM(A.reg_cnt) reg_cnt ,SUM(A.req_anal_tool_cnt) req_anal_tool_cnt ,SUM(A.req_data_anal_cnt) req_data_anal_cnt ,SUM(A.req_data_collect_cnt) req_data_collect_cnt ,SUM(A.req_dnld_cnt) req_dnld_cnt ,SUM(A.share_anal_idea_cnt) share_anal_idea_cnt ,SUM(A.share_data_visual_cnt) share_data_visual_cnt ,SUM(A.share_use_example_cnt) share_use_example_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_bigdata_cnt) communi_bigdata_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_inquire_cnt) communi_inquire_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_lib_cnt) communi_lib_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_news_cnt) communi_news_cnt FROM kcgbd.t_statistic A WHERE 1=1 AND A.statistic_date BETWEEN #{from_date} AND #{to_date} GROUP BY A.statistic_date ORDER BY statistic_date

/* stat.mng.dashboard.getReqStat */ SELECT SUM(req_anal_tool_cnt) req_anal_tool_cnt ,SUM(req_data_anal_cnt) req_data_anal_cnt ,SUM(req_data_collect_cnt) req_data_collect_cnt ,SUM(req_dnld_cnt) req_dnld_cnt FROM kcgbd.t_statistic WHERE 1=1 AND statistic_date BETWEEN #{from_date} AND #{to_date}

/* stat.mng.dashboard.getKeywordStat */ SELECT A.keyword ,SUM(A.keyword_cnt) keyword_cnt FROM kcgbd.t_keyword_log A WHERE 1=1 AND A.reg_date BETWEEN #{from_date} AND #{to_date} GROUP BY A.keyword ORDER BY keyword_cnt desc LIMIT 10

/* stat.mng.dashboard.getStatisticDataTotal */ SELECT SUM(A.visit_cnt) visit_cnt ,SUM(A.reg_cnt) reg_cnt ,SUM(A.req_anal_tool_cnt) req_anal_tool_cnt ,SUM(A.req_data_anal_cnt) req_data_anal_cnt ,SUM(A.req_data_collect_cnt) req_data_collect_cnt ,SUM(A.req_dnld_cnt) req_dnld_cnt ,SUM(A.share_anal_idea_cnt) share_anal_idea_cnt ,SUM(A.share_data_visual_cnt) share_data_visual_cnt ,SUM(A.share_use_example_cnt) share_use_example_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_bigdata_cnt) communi_bigdata_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_inquire_cnt) communi_inquire_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_lib_cnt) communi_lib_cnt ,SUM(A.communi_news_cnt) communi_news_cnt FROM kcgbd.t_statistic A WHERE 1=1 AND A.statistic_date BETWEEN #{from_date} AND #{to_date}
